#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;

    if(n>=0 && n<=510)
    {
        if(n==0)
            cout<<"1"<<endl;
        else if(n==1)
            cout<<"0"<<endl;
        else
        {
            while(n!=0)
            {
                if(n%2==0)
                   {
                     cout<<"8";
                     n=n-2;
                   }
                   else
                   {
                      cout<<"4";
                      n=n-1;
                   }


            }
        }

    }
}
